page.title: 05CHARTERS RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: Charters recreation centre was built at Charters school because of the good recreation facilities it already had and that it would be a valuable assett for the local community.The Sports Centre is for all ages but specialises in the 5-13 and 25-40 age ranges.About 80% of the people who use the Sports Centre come from South Ascot.It is forecast that the centre has a big future.Two more squash courts will be built and a cover may be put on the pool.Smaller facilities like saunas and jaccuzzis should be available.At the moment there are a large variety of activities available to members and their guests including indoor soccer, netball,basketball,badminton,squash, gymnastics,trampolining,tennis(indoor and outdoor),table tennis,weights, swimming and 'fun mornings'.The licensed bar is also very popular.
